title: Vampire Survivors saved its creator from working on mobile gambling games

title: Ubisoft's open-world Star Wars game will not have procedurally generated planets: Every game world is 'handcrafted'
description: Julian Gerighty said each of Star Wars Outlaw's game world will have an explorable area roughly equivalent to two of the regions in Assassin's Creed Odyssey.

title: 24 years after its forgotten PC debut, it's past time for Sega's Sakura Wars to get its due
description: The classic adventure-strategy-comedy-sim is begging for an English re-release.

title: Sony throws in the towel, signs 10 year Call of Duty deal with Microsoft
description: Sony and Microsoft have reached a “binding agreement” to keep Call of Duty games on PlayStation.

title: Not all AI voice cloning is bad, I promise
description: AI voice cloning is being used for some evil things of late; let's go back over the good that's come out of it.

description: I want to break free.

description: This key "drops" when you try to teleport out of a specific dungeon.

title: Viewfinder review
description: This mind-bending puzzle game is ready to change your whole perspective.

title: Leaked 3DMark numbers suggest AMD's next graphics card should undercut the RTX 4070 and outperform it
description: New leaked performance figures for the RX 7800 suggest it will deliver higher rasterised performance compared with the RTX 4070.

description: This NPC can be tricky to find if you haven't unlocked the Obsidian Throne.

description: The numbers show impressive upticks in performance, and the likelihood that the upcoming chips will be neural networking champs.
